summary: Have you ever meet someone or something that is really disgusting and you really want to puke on them? Well this is your lucky day! With the new power you can do this all day long~
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever meet someone or something that is really disgusting and you really want to puke on them? Well this is your lucky day! With the new power you can do this all day long~

Thanks for Reading !
This is my first mod and i think it is a little bit buggy in many ways 
but at least this puking mod is very least fulfill the following

1. sort of coming out from the mouth....(it is really hard to make this work)
2. puking instead of spitting (it is only a thin wall between...)
3. got some sound effect 
4. it works!! (how amazing!!)

----------------How to install-----------------------
Use NMM 
or put the \\\\\\\"vomit.esp\\\\\\\" file into the \\\\\\\"data\\\\\\\" folder under \\\\\\\"skyrim\\\\\\\" folder


----------How to learn the spell-----------------
I put a recipe named \\\\\\\"Puke on everything\\\\\\\" on a chest in Honorhall Orphanage in Riften
or you may use the console \\\\\\\"help vomit\\\\\\\" to search the spell ID 
and use the console \\\\\\\"addspell\\\\\\\" to learn
author: Copycat
